fractured-reverie.title: Fractured Reverie (PC, Steam)
fractured-reverie.overview: Overview: A psychological horror game with a branching storyline. You play as Ray, a six-year-old who wakes in his bedroom, sensing something off. After his mother gives him medicine, he awakens in a hospital—and each time he falls asleep in one place, he wakes up in the other. The loop repeats as you investigate what’s real and uncover the truth.
fractured-reverie.systems: Key Systems: Branching narrative built with ScriptableObjects; physics-based item interaction (pick up/inspect) via raycasts and constraints
